testthat 3.0.0 out now! — https://t.co/zmzYWiME1A. So many new features, but most useful are the idea of the edition (which lets us safely make backward incompatible changes) and snapshot tests (which automatically record expected outputs in a separate file) #rstats

Averaging daily temperature data over longer periods reveals underlying warming trend over England.

This is a less complicated version of previous #dataviz, I'm interested if is more accessible?
